title: IIT Mandi Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 07 Senior Project Scientist and Other Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Technology (IIT Mandi) has released the official Notification for 2025. To fill up the Vacancies for 07 Senior Project Scientists, Project Scientists, Project Engineers, and  Assistant  Project Managers. Candidates who have qualified in B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech in Civil Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering, and Ph.D. can apply for the IIT Mandi Recruitment 2025 . Here, we have provided information such as the Age Limit, Selecti...
